review: Great product. Everyone I gave these to loves them. Love that it doesn't limit the device it's attached to. You can continue doing whatever you want on the device you are streaming from without any lag even taking calls on your smart phone while it is streaming. Great product!
author: Tony Syrakis Jr

review: I love chromecast! It's really good! I'm a gamer, so i watch my pro gaming on twitch(Which works wells). I also have used Hulu as well. At the time of this review, it doesn't support amazon instant video but i found a work around for it. Either you can cast your screen on a mobile device(In my case i used my phone). Or you can stream your desktop to your chromecast(may need a few settings adjusted but works none the less).
